snippet: Nationalist Serbian lawmakers booed the European Union's top diplomat Federica Mogherini on Friday as she addressed their parliament during tour aimed at addressing concerns about rising tensions in the Balkans....

headline.main: Before His Arrest in Threats to Jewish Groups, Suspect Fumed at Racism
headline.print_headline: Before His Arrest in Threats to Jewish Groups, Suspect Fumed at Racism

lead_paragraph: Nationalist Serbian lawmakers booed the European Union's top diplomat Federica Mogherini on Friday as she addressed their parliament during tour aimed at addressing concerns about rising tensions in the Balkans.
